text: Psydrax pergracilis is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Kerala in India.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Psydrax pergracilis. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998. Downloaded on 22 November 2015. ==References== pergracilis Category:Endemic flora of India (region) Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Psydrax pergracilis
